backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining product, contact, and document types with query and update functions for retrieval and submission, plus static business info fields and blob-storage mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Report documenting a feature to make the custom domain canonical and listing affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and functionality of all key frontend files and components.
Guide explaining how to configure pccomputerandcommunication.com as the primary domain for the IC app with DNS and verification steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and applying global background and text styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file with canonical link set to https://pccomputerandcommunication.com and script loading the React app.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Domain verification file listing pccomputerandcommunication.com for IC boundary node validation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wiring theme provider, layout, and all major sections including header, hero, products, about, contact, documents, and footer.
frontend/src/catalog/staticProducts.ts: Static product catalog with metadata and image URLs plus helper for looking up products by name.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section with company intro, storefront image, descriptive text, and a grid of core value cards.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section providing a message form with backend submission and cards for phone, email, address, business hours, and Facebook link.
frontend/src/components/Documents.tsx: Displays a list of documents with loading states, date formatting, and options to view or download each file.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with company info, quick navigation links, contact details, and social media icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides a responsive header with scroll-based styling, deep-link handling, and navigation that smoothly scrolls to page sections.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Implements the homepage hero section with a background banner, marketing text, feature highlights, and buttons that scroll to other sections.
frontend/src/components/Products.tsx: Fetches and displays products grouped by category, showing category icons, product cards, images, and pricing with loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, storing identity state, and exposing login and logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query hooks for documents, contact submissions, and products, including enrichment of product data with static catalog info.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme CSS variables for light and dark modes, plus utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with theme extensions, color variables, plugins, and custom animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including feature requirements, architectural notes, and current state version.
